Crypto Course Project - Variants of RSA
----------------------------------------


Language used:
--------------
JAVA


Tools used:
----------- 
a. Eclispe IDE


Operating system:
-----------------
Platform independent (Windows and Linux supported)
Developement was carried out in Windows


Cryptosystems:
------------------------
a. Batch RSA  (Batch_rsa.java) 
b. Multi prime RSA (Mprime_rsa.java)
c. Multi power RSA (Mpower_rsa.java)
d. Rebalanced RSA (Rebalanced_rsa.java)
e. Rprime RSA (Rprime_rsa.java)

Sample Input and Output:
------------------------
Input message can be two or more numbers corresponding to messages of each client
Output:
p q 7 5
N 35phi 24
e[0]=11
e[1]=13
Ciphertext
c[0]=12
c[1]=19
a0 12463666194958415022960672768
phi 24
a 

Decrypted Plaintext
3
19

To Run the programs eclipse IDE for Java can be used
			
	or the following commands are to be run:

1. javac name_of_program.java
2. java name_of_program
